sentences.sContent: It can be derived from plants, animals or other categories such as fungus or fermented products like alcohol.
sentences.sContent_eng: It can be derived from plants, animals or other categories such as fungus or fermented products like alcohol.
sentences.sCn: 它的来源来自植物、动物或者其他物质，例如真菌类或者像酒等发酵产品。

remMethod.val: fun(有趣的) + g + us(我们) → 我们去采了蘑菇， 真有趣 → 真菌

trans.tranOther: a simple type of plant that has no leaves or flowers and that grows on plants or other surfaces.  mushrooms  and  mould  are both fungi.
